channel.title: 317 Delta - Shops cause the game to crash
channel.description:
Some shops work. If I create a platebody shop, with basic armors (bronze, iron, steel, mith, addy, rune) it works fine. However, if I make a shop with staffs (elemental and basic), the game will lose connection when I hit "Trade".
It does this for multiple shops, so what's the problem? Thanks!

item.title: 317 Delta - Shops cause the game to crash
